nodes.text: Venisa Doza's X-wing  was a modified X-wing starfighter owned by Resistance pilot Venisa Doza. She flew the starfighter during the First Order/Resistance War, accompanied by her astromech droid Torch.

Venisa Doza's X-wing first appeared in the Star Wars Resistance season 2 episode "Rendezvous Point". The starfighter was designed by veteran modelmaker Bill George, who created a 3D model that was then scanned to create the animation model. Both Doza's X-wing and her droid Torch were designed to look like she'd been using them since the era of the Galactic Civil War, as she'd been a fighter pilot from a young age.
